parameters: \c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]How did you know it was me before I even started to talk?
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Almost no one knows this number.
\c[1]Ye Jingshan \c[0]You answered a call from this number at the public phone market owned by the Tians.
I guess you memorized the number back then.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You're very smart, Ye Jingshan, you almost fooled everyone.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]If you had taken that train just now, your plan would have succeeded.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I asked my superior for some time to ask you some questions alone.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]You got me, I have nothing to say.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]This isn't an interrogation, it's an equal communication.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Someone once taught me \c[1]to exchange questions for questions\c[0].
\c[2] Lin Lixun \c[0]You probably also have a lot of questions for me.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]What's the point of doing this?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I know you didn't poison the family, I don't want to pin it on the wrong person.
But I also want to know why you did what you've done.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I don't know what you're talking about.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You've treated me as a pawn ever since I entered the clinic.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You led me to investigate the Tian family case because you have created a new suspect for the case.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You pretended to be a smoker in front of me so I'd believe
that you were burned to death in the fire due to your smoking habit.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]This way, Zhao Xiaojuan could be cleared of charges,
and the 'real murderer' would be burned to death while you escaped.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I answered your question, now it's your turn to answer mine.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Why did you help Zhao Xiaojuan escape the Tian family?
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I was \c[1]trafficked\c[0] here as a kid, but the townspeople are unaware of this.
I barely shared this secret with people.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Zhao Xiaojuan was trapped here just like me.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I helped her just like helping my patients.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Her 'illness' came from this place, so leaving here was her best treatment.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]It's my turn to ask a question.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]How did you discover that I wasn't dead?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Your plan was very thorough, but the corpse
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]...which part of the body gave me away?
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Was there anything special about the collarbone?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Your \c[1]ribs were broken\c[0] by Tian Xiangrong.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Under normal circumstances, even if your ribs had recovered, there would be \c[1]fibrocartilage calluses\c[0].
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Our forensic expert spent the whole night putting the ribs together,
and found out that the ribs didn't have any calluses.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Seems like I underestimated your forensic expert.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]The forensic expert was none other than the student of the famous Liu Yuqiong...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]It's my turn to ask a question.
\c[2] Lin Lixun \c[0]Why did you try to take the blame?
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I've thought of the worst scenario when I helped Zhao Xiaojuan develop an escape plan.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]But I didn't expect that the situation would get much worse.
\c[2] Ye Jingshan \c[0]After her death, people called her a madwoman, a psycho, a murderer...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]It was my plan that killed Zhao Xiaojuan and Fangfang.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I should be the one to bear the charges.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Dr. Ye, no one could predict that things would go in that direction...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]That was just my first reason, my second reason....
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Since I was a child, my adoptive parents kept telling me that I was abandoned by my biological parents.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]My adoptive parents arranged a lot of things that I didn't want.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I never resisted, I wanted to repay them for the kind act of nurturing me.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]They didn't tell me the truth until they were on their deathbeds.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]They'd been deceiving me for their whole life.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0] After they passed away, I didn't shed a tear,
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]The name Ye Jingshan still trap me here.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I wanted this name to bear all the charge. And I will start a new life with a new identity...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]That counts as another question, it's my turn to ask.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I left you with a question during our first call.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]How did you find these clues?
I can communicate with the dead
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]You just promised that this would be an equal exchange.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I investigated the Tian family and uncovered key information.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I knew the Tian family, there was nothing to investigate there.
I can communicate with the dead
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]There is a saying in the field of forensics, that forensics is a profession that can 'communicate' with the dead.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Yes, but that's just an analogy.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I can also 'communicate' with the dead.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I can see into their past.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I know secrets that only the dead knows.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Perhaps this unreasonable answer is the most reasonable.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Can you continue to answer that question now?
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Leaving Qingtan was Zhao Xiaojuan's will and her expectation of me.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]On the day of the incident, she came to the clinic to buy medicine...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]She was a respectable person. She was not only saving herself, but me as well.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I didn't understand at that time, but it was too late when I did.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]After she died, I told myself that I should try to leave.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]She wouldn't want you to leave in this way.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]But I'm the type of person that can't move forward without being pushed.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]And when I finally decided to move forward...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I realized I was still trapped.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You obviously had the opportunity to get in the train before I showed up.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Officer Lin, do you see the mountains ahead?
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]When I stare at them, I feel an indescribable confusion and fear.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Maybe they're just a mass of lifeless ashes, or maybe they're still smoldering inside.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I feel as if I can see my biological parents.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Their figures are vague, they are wandering through the mountains like ghosts.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Their mouths are open and they are calling out.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]But I've forgotten my original name long ago.
\c[2] Ye Jingshan \c[0]I didn't understand until then...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]There isn't any place for me in the world.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]A home that was once warm, the people who can accompany me...
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]have been buried in these mountains of ashes.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Doctor Ye, do you have any questions?
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I have no more questions, I only have one request.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]Officer Lin, please forget the conversation that just happened.
\c[2]Ye Jingshan \c[0]I'm the criminal who killed three Tian family members and caused Zhao Xiaojuan to commit suicide.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You're suspected of arson and desecration of a human corpse...
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]You're under arrest in accordance with the law.
After re-investigation, the police discovered Ye Jingshan falsified the evidence of him killing the Tian family.
The identity of the burned corpse was also confirmed. It was Wang Jincai, the owner of the small store.
Ye Jingshan was prosecuted for arson, desecration of a human corpse, and falsifying evidence.
The Tian Family Murder Case was back to its original state. The case was closed again.
Actually, I still have one more question for Ye Jingshan.
\oc[15]I want to know if another person was also involved in his plan.
\oc[15]I don't think he will answer this question.
\oc[15]I will keep this answer in my heart forever.
